lexUnit.name: extradite.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: hand over (a person accused or convicted of a crime) to the jurisdiction of the foreign state in which the crime was committed.

sentence.text: LA PAZ , Bolivia ( AP ) --- A terrorist suspect from France was extradited Monday from the United States to Bolivia to face charges of working with a guerrilla organization linked to several deaths .
